jodd.madvoc.component

Class ActionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.component.ActionsManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProxettaAwareActionsManager

    public class ActionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all Madvoc action and aliases registrations.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllActionRuntimes

        public java.util.List<ActionRuntime> getAllActionRuntimes()
        Returns all registered action runtime configurations. Returned list is a join of action paths with and without the macro.

      • getAllAliases

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllAliases()

        Returns total number of registered actions.

      • registerAction

        public ActionRuntime registerAction(java.lang.Class actionClass,
                                    java.lang.reflect.Method actionMethod,
                                    ActionDefinition actionDefinition)
        Registration main point. Does two things:
        • parse action and creates ActionRuntime
        • registers created ActionRuntime
        Returns created ActionRuntime.
        See Also:
        registerActionRuntime(ActionRuntime)

      • registerActionRuntime

        public ActionRuntime registerActionRuntime(ActionRuntime actionRuntime)
        Registers manually created action runtime configurations. Optionally, if action path with the same name already exist, exception will be thrown.

      • lookup

        public ActionRuntime lookup(java.lang.String method,
                            java.lang.String[] actionPath)

      • lookup

        public ActionRuntime lookup(java.lang.String actionString)
        Lookups action runtime config for given action class and method string (aka 'action string'). The action string has the following format: className#methodName.
        See Also:
        ActionRuntime.createActionString()

      • registerPathAlias
